name: 4HOME Furniture
tag_list: furniture, furnishigs, online-shop, ecommerce, 4home, living-room, kitchen, diningroom, bedroom, kids-room, office, hall, garden, bathroom
overview:
MISSION The mission of 4Home OÃœ is to offer a wide selection of interior decoration products to retail customers across Europe with the best possible user experience and cost-effective logistics. Manufacturers of interior decoration products in Estonia and elsewhere are offered an alternative channel for sales to customers, also enabling the manufacturers to enter new markets.

WHAT WE OFFER?

  1. best possible user experience 1.1 high-quality product presentation and specifications 1.2 excellent usability 1.3 wide selection of products
  2. products sold and delivered to any location in Europe (EU)
  3. straightforward and equal product pricing for customers in all countries
  4. product information and customer support in their native language (in accordance with the launched markets)
  5. a customer residing in several countries can purchase all from one place
  6. fine-tuned logistics (Estonia, Latvia, Lithuania and Finland) 6.1 delivery pricing with maximum customer advantage 6.2 we do not hide delivery costs in the product price
  7. wide range of payment options
  8. 14-day refund guarantee
  9. product installation if the customer is located in Estonia

HISTORY The 4Home OÃœ company was founded in early 2006 with the aim of offering interior decoration products online. The company is based in Estonia. The latter company operates a logistical centre where a considerable part of our goods sold online is stored. The people behind 4Home OÃœ possess 25 years of experience in the furniture sector, including 15 years of active furniture sales in Estonia and abroad.
